db query: SELECT id, company_id, email, first_name, last_name, role, password_hash, is_active, last_login_at FROM users WHERE email = ? LIMIT 1
UPDATE refresh_tokens SET is_revoked = true WHERE token = ?
SELECT id, company_id, email, first_name, last_name, role, is_active, last_login_at, created_at, updated_at FROM users WHERE id = ? LIMIT 1
SELECT id, expires_at FROM refresh_tokens WHERE token = ? AND user_id = ? AND is_revoked = false LIMIT 1 FOR UPDATE
INSERT INTO applications (job_id, candidate_id, status, applied_at, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (?, ?, 'applied', NOW(), NOW(), NOW())

SELECT j.id, j.title, j.description, j.location, j.employment_type, j.status, j.positions_count, j.created_at, c.name AS company_name FROM job_requisitions j JOIN companies c ON j.company_id = c.id ${whereSql} ORDER BY j.created_at DESC

SELECT j.*, c.name AS company_name, u.first_name AS creator_first, u.last_name AS creator_last FROM job_requisitions j JOIN companies c ON j.company_id = c.id JOIN users u ON j.created_by = u.id WHERE j.id = ? LIMIT 1

SELECT cp.user_id, u.first_name, u.last_name, u.email, cp.phone, cp.address, cp.resume_url, cp.profile_data, cp.is_verified, cp.updated_at FROM candidate_profiles cp JOIN users u ON cp.user_id = u.id WHERE cp.user_id = ? LIMIT 1
UPDATE candidate_profiles SET phone = ?, address = ?, profile_data = ?, updated_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = ?
UPDATE candidate_profiles SET resume_url = ?, updated_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = ?

SELECT a.*, j.title, j.company_id, c.name AS company_name FROM applications a JOIN job_requisitions j ON a.job_id = j.id JOIN companies c ON j.company_id = c.id WHERE a.candidate_id = ? ORDER BY a.applied_at DESC
SELECT * FROM offers WHERE application_id = ? ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT application_id FROM offers WHERE id = ? LIMIT 1
SELECT application_id FROM offers WHERE id = ? LIMIT 1
UPDATE users SET first_name = ?, last_name = ?, email = ?, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
DELETE FROM saved_jobs WHERE candidate_id = ? AND job_id = ?
SELECT j.*, c.name AS company_name FROM saved_jobs sj JOIN job_requisitions j ON sj.job_id = j.id JOIN companies c ON j.company_id = c.id WHERE sj.candidate_id = ? ORDER BY sj.saved_at DESC
INSERT INTO saved_jobs (candidate_id, job_id, saved_at) VALUES (?, ?, NOW())
UPDATE candidate_profiles SET is_verified = 1, updated_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = ?

SELECT a.*, u.first_name, u.last_name, u.email, cp.resume_url FROM applications a JOIN users u ON a.candidate_id = u.id LEFT JOIN candidate_profiles cp ON u.id = cp.user_id WHERE a.job_id = ? ORDER BY a.applied_at DESC
UPDATE applications SET status = ?, final_decision_at = NOW(), updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
UPDATE applications SET status = ?, current_stage_id = ?, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
UPDATE applications SET offer_recommended = 1, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
UPDATE applications SET status = ?, screening_decision_at = NOW(), updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
SELECT status, COUNT(*) AS count FROM applications WHERE job_id = ? GROUP BY status

SELECT j.id, j.title, j.description, j.location, j.employment_type, j.status, j.positions_count, j.created_at, c.name AS company_name FROM job_requisitions j JOIN companies c ON j.company_id = c.id ${whereSql} ORDER BY j.created_at DESC

INSERT INTO job_requisitions (company_id, created_by, title, description, requirements, location, employment_type, status, positions_count, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, 'draft', ?, NOW(), NOW())

SELECT j.*, c.name AS company_name, u.first_name AS creator_first, u.last_name AS creator_last FROM job_requisitions j JOIN companies c ON j.company_id = c.id JOIN users u ON j.created_by = u.id WHERE j.id = ? LIMIT 1
UPDATE job_requisitions SET title = ?, description = ?, requirements = ?, location = ?, employment_type = ?, positions_count = ?, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ? AND status IN ('draft', 'pending')
UPDATE job_requisitions SET status = 'closed', closed_at = NOW(), updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
UPDATE job_requisitions SET status = 'published', published_at = NOW(), updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
UPDATE job_requisitions SET status = 'pending', updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
SELECT * FROM offers WHERE application_id = ? ORDER BY created_at DESC
INSERT INTO offers (application_id, created_by, status, offer_details, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (?, ?, 'draft', ?, NOW(), NOW())
UPDATE offers SET status = 'sent', document_url = ?, esign_link = ?, sent_at = NOW(), updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
UPDATE users SET first_name = ?, last_name = ?, email = ?, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
SELECT id, email, first_name, last_name, role, is_active, created_at FROM users WHERE role = ? AND is_active = 1 ORDER BY last_name, first_name
INSERT INTO users (company_id, email, password_hash, first_name, last_name, role, is_active, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, 1, NOW(), NOW())
UPDATE users SET is_active = 0, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
SELECT id, company_id, email, first_name, last_name, role, is_active, last_login_at, created_at, updated_at FROM users WHERE id = ? LIMIT 1
UPDATE users SET first_name = ?, last_name = ?, email = ?, role = ?, company_id = ?, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
UPDATE users SET is_active = 1, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM users WHERE role = ? AND is_active = 1

SELECT a.*, u.first_name, u.last_name, u.email, cp.resume_url FROM applications a JOIN users u ON a.candidate_id = u.id LEFT JOIN candidate_profiles cp ON u.id = cp.user_id WHERE a.job_id = ? ORDER BY a.applied_at DESC
UPDATE applications SET status = ?, current_stage_id = ?, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
UPDATE applications SET offer_recommended = 1, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
UPDATE applications SET status = ?, screening_decision_at = NOW(), updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?

SELECT cp.user_id, u.first_name, u.last_name, u.email, cp.phone, cp.address, cp.resume_url, cp.profile_data, cp.is_verified, cp.updated_at FROM candidate_profiles cp JOIN users u ON cp.user_id = u.id WHERE cp.user_id = ? LIMIT 1
UPDATE candidate_profiles SET phone = ?, address = ?, profile_data = ?, updated_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = ?
UPDATE candidate_profiles SET resume_url = ?, updated_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = ?
SELECT i.*, u.first_name AS interviewer_first, u.last_name AS interviewer_last FROM interviews i JOIN users u ON i.interviewer_id = u.id WHERE i.application_id = ? ORDER BY i.scheduled_at
INSERT INTO interviews (application_id, interviewer_id, scheduled_at, duration_minutes, meeting_link, status, notes, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, 'scheduled', ?, NOW(), NOW())
UPDATE interviews SET status = ?, notes = ?, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?

SELECT j.id, j.title, j.description, j.location, j.employment_type, j.status, j.positions_count, j.created_at, c.name AS company_name FROM job_requisitions j JOIN companies c ON j.company_id = c.id ${whereSql} ORDER BY j.created_at DESC

INSERT INTO job_requisitions (company_id, created_by, title, description, requirements, location, employment_type, status, positions_count, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, 'draft', ?, NOW(), NOW())

SELECT j.*, c.name AS company_name, u.first_name AS creator_first, u.last_name AS creator_last FROM job_requisitions j JOIN companies c ON j.company_id = c.id JOIN users u ON j.created_by = u.id WHERE j.id = ? LIMIT 1
UPDATE job_requisitions SET title = ?, description = ?, requirements = ?, location = ?, employment_type = ?, positions_count = ?, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ? AND status IN ('draft', 'pending')
UPDATE job_requisitions SET status = 'pending', updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
INSERT INTO offers (application_id, created_by, status, offer_details, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (?, ?, 'draft', ?, NOW(), NOW())
UPDATE offers SET status = 'sent', document_url = ?, esign_link = ?, sent_at = NOW(), updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
UPDATE users SET first_name = ?, last_name = ?, email = ?, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
UPDATE applications SET status = ?, final_decision_at = NOW(), updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?

SELECT ja.*, j.title, j.created_by, u.first_name AS requester FROM job_approvals ja JOIN job_requisitions j ON ja.job_id = j.id JOIN users u ON j.created_by = u.id WHERE ja.approver_id = ? AND ja.status = 'pending'

SELECT j.*, c.name AS company_name, u.first_name AS creator_first, u.last_name AS creator_last FROM job_requisitions j JOIN companies c ON j.company_id = c.id JOIN users u ON j.created_by = u.id WHERE j.id = ? LIMIT 1
UPDATE job_approvals SET status = 'approved', comments = ?, approved_at = NOW(), updated_at = NOW() WHERE job_id = ? AND approver_id = ?
UPDATE job_requisitions SET status = 'closed', closed_at = NOW(), updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
UPDATE job_requisitions SET status = 'published', published_at = NOW(), updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
UPDATE job_approvals SET status = 'rejected', comments = ?, updated_at = NOW() WHERE job_id = ? AND approver_id = ?
UPDATE users SET first_name = ?, last_name = ?, email = ?, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
SELECT i.*, u.first_name AS interviewer_first, u.last_name AS interviewer_last FROM interviews i JOIN users u ON i.interviewer_id = u.id WHERE i.application_id = ? ORDER BY i.scheduled_at
UPDATE interviews SET status = ?, notes = ?, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
UPDATE users SET first_name = ?, last_name = ?, email = ?, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
SELECT * FROM scorecards WHERE interview_id = ? ORDER BY created_at
INSERT INTO scorecards (interview_id, interviewer_id, ratings, comments, recommendation, is_final, submitted_at, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, 0, NOW(), NOW(), NOW())
UPDATE scorecards SET is_final = 1, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE entity_type = ? AND entity_id = ? ORDER BY created_at DESC
INSERT INTO audit_logs (user_id, action, entity_type, entity_id, old_data, new_data, ip_address, created_at) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, NOW())
INSERT INTO background_jobs (job_type, payload, status, scheduled_at, created_at) VALUES (?, ?, 'pending', COALESCE(?, NOW()), NOW())
UPDATE background_jobs SET status = 'completed', completed_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
UPDATE background_jobs SET status = 'failed', error_message = ?, retries = retries + 1 WHERE id = ?
SELECT * FROM background_jobs WHERE status = 'pending' AND scheduled_at <= NOW() ORDER BY scheduled_at LIMIT 10
SELECT id, name, domain, is_active, created_at FROM companies WHERE is_active = 1 ORDER BY name
INSERT INTO companies (name, domain, is_active, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (?, ?, 1, NOW(), NOW())
UPDATE companies SET is_active = 0, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
SELECT id, name, domain, is_active, created_at, updated_at FROM companies WHERE id = ? LIMIT 1
UPDATE companies SET name = ?, domain = ?, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
UPDATE companies SET is_active = 1, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM companies WHERE is_active = 1
UPDATE users SET first_name = ?, last_name = ?, email = ?, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
SELECT id, email, first_name, last_name, role, is_active, created_at FROM users WHERE role = ? AND is_active = 1 ORDER BY last_name, first_name
INSERT INTO users (company_id, email, password_hash, first_name, last_name, role, is_active, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, 1, NOW(), NOW())
UPDATE users SET is_active = 0, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
SELECT id, company_id, email, first_name, last_name, role, is_active, last_login_at, created_at, updated_at FROM users WHERE id = ? LIMIT 1
UPDATE users SET first_name = ?, last_name = ?, email = ?, role = ?, company_id = ?, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
UPDATE users SET is_active = 1, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM users WHERE role = ? AND is_active = 1
